Class AppointmentQueries

public class AppointmentQueries extends Object

    • countAppMonthType

      public static String countAppMonthType(LocalDateTime monthPicked, String type) throws SQLException
      Parameters:
      monthPicked - Month picked by the user to count appointments
      type - Type input by the user to count appointments
      Returns:
      the total count of appointments through the filter
      Throws:
      SQLException - if value input is wrong
